QuestData.Title: One Small Step for Magic
QuestData.Description: It is time to embrace the future.$b$bI have mastered every magic known to our kind. I will master this one.$b$bBy applying the principles of arcane magic it is fairly trivial to control the primitive fel energies within the material you have given me. I need to move to live prey next.$b$bLet us start with a small summoning. Defeat the creature for me and watch how a true scholar works!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Kyrtos and assist him with his ritual.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes...$b$bThis power is... different. Brutal, blunt, powerful.$b$bI can control it. I can master it!
